title: dodging Q
body:
hi, im here to say something about the dodging q times, I'm fine for the first time u dodge, 5 minutes are ok, but the 2nd time it becomes 30 minutes, that's outrageous, and even when it's not "your fault", some external problems you had forced you to dodge.
I think making the waiting time scaling, e.g. 5, 10, 15, etc minutes would be much better.

replies.body:
I find that increasing move speed helps with dodging many Q's.
It also works with many W's, E's and R's too.
Find another game you can have as a side game.. Helps me same as when I get sick of league
It resets everyday. Usually if you are dodging more than twice a day you probably shouldn't play league until your external circumstances stop preventing you from playing out the games.
